'''Jemaine Atea Mahana Clement''' is a {{Wikipedia|New Zealand}} actor, comedian, musician, and filmmaker. He is a part of the musical comedy duo {{Wikipedia|Flight of the Conchords}}, and has appeared in several films and television series, such as ''{{Wikipedia|What We Do in the Shadows}}'', ''{{Wikipedia|Men in Black 3}}'', ''[[Moana]]'', {{Wikipedia|Rio (2011 film)|Rio}}, and ''{{Wikipedia|Harold and the Purple Crayon (film)|Harold and the Purple Crayon}}''.

== In the ''Minecraft'' franchise ==
In 2025, Jemaine played a supporting role in {{AMCM}}, portraying the eccentric auctioneer {{AMCM|Daryl}}. He also voiced a minor animated character, the {{AMCM|piglin}} {{AMCM|Bruce}}, pivotal to {{AMCM|Malgosha}}'s backstory.

== Trivia ==

* Prior to being cast in ''A Minecraft Movie'', one of Clement's prior roles, [https://disney.fandom.com/wiki/Tamatoa Tamatoa], appeared in the [[Moana Character Pack]] and [[Moana 2]].
